summary: A terrifying supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse after a chance encounter with a strange little girl.
cast: Jeremy Sumpter|Elizabeth Di Prinzio|Brett Davern|Chris Coy|Linsey Godfrey|Virginia Williams|Johnathon Schaech|Harley Graham|Jennifer Bowman|Chelsea Bruland|Sydney Dwyer|Alice Ford|Zaria Griffin|Met Salih
keywords: supernatural power|psychotronic film|house|road trip|group of friends
title: The Culling
